𒈣𒁺𒁺 MÁ.LAḪ5 malāḫum مَلَّاح mallāḥ < мара́к marák marinarius marinellus 𒈣𒁺𒁺 marine, sailor ≈ 𒈣𒁶𒁶 MA₂-GIM-GIM •MA₂RA-GIM > malāḫim ملاح mallāḥ মাল্লা malla amellal galama 𒈣𒁶𒁶 boat-builder, boatman
